item.description:
I've reserved the Screening room at 360 State Street for another Movie Night!  You can see a film for Free at this time and location.

There are absolutely NO "maybe" RSVPS.

I will need  FULL NAMES (and that of any +1) for the Concierge to let in. Please Provide as asked when you RSVP. (You can also Event Comment, Email, or Text me.)

If you have any questions, PLEASE see the 360 Movie Nights FAQ posted on the message board and linked here.  Many of them (snacks, No Show Policy, ect.) are discussed there.

Seats are Limited, so please only RSVP if you're going to come, and change accordingly if something comes up.

This Events Film Is...

Halloween (1978 - Horror - 91 minutes - Rated R)

IMDB Description: A psychotic murderer institutionalized since childhood escapes on a mindless rampage while his doctor chases him through the streets.

Staring: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, and Tony Moran

AJ's Comments: Yes, we tried to show this last year and the screening room broke down on us.  Let's give it another go, I've still shamefully not seen all of it.

Event start time is 7:00 for the social portion, so you can start showing up then but please no earlier. We will not start the film until 7:30 or shortly there after, but don't plan to be any later.  (There are now restrictions on room time.)

Feel free to use the waiting list. If someone else backs out you can be automatically added, just provide your full name for the concierge as a contingency.  (I recommend RSVPing individually rather than using +1's if wait-listing.)
item.how_to_find_us: Ring the Bell Button or Call the concierge on the cell phone number on the door, they will Direct you. If you have added problems, call AJ at 315-345-9348.
item.name: 360 Movie: Halloween (Let's try this one again.)
